data.name: Abfense
data.detailed_description:
The peace and quiet of everyday life will be dispelled like an illusion after the appearance of a mysterious stranger on the tail with an enemy army.
Unpredictable circumstances, interesting puzzles and situations that can change the course of events in a split second, go through a difficult path in this struggle for your own home and freedom.

Tower Defense

Build, upgrade, and take part directly in first-person battles. Destroy waves of enemies that are coming at you.

Puzzle levels

Not only destroy enemies, but also complete puzzles to advance further in the story.

Boss battle

Fight your enemy one-on-one. Defeat him and protect your home.
data.about_the_game:
The peace and quiet of everyday life will be dispelled like an illusion after the appearance of a mysterious stranger on the tail with an enemy army.
Unpredictable circumstances, interesting puzzles and situations that can change the course of events in a split second, go through a difficult path in this struggle for your own home and freedom.

Tower Defense

Build, upgrade, and take part directly in first-person battles. Destroy waves of enemies that are coming at you.

Puzzle levels

Not only destroy enemies, but also complete puzzles to advance further in the story.

Boss battle

Fight your enemy one-on-one. Defeat him and protect your home.
data.short_description: Abfense - is a Tower Defense / FPS hybrid. Make sure that your choice is correct, overcome obstacles and solve puzzles to defeat enemies on your doorstep.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD Athlon X4 640
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1030 / Radeon RX 550
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 1050 / Radeon R9 285
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
